name: Altaf Tadavi
description: '''Altaf Sheikh''' (born 30 August 1999), known professionally as '''MC STAN''' (stylized as '''MC STâˆ†N'''), is an Indian [[Rapping|rapper]], lyricist, [[Record producer|music producer]], and composer who was the winner of the sixteenth season of [[Bigg Boss (Hindi TV series) season 16|''Bigg Boss'']] in 2023. He is known for his work in the [[Music of India|Hindi hip-hop]] and [[trap music]] scene.
